### Definitions

- **MTG**: Meteosat Third Generation  system of geostationary satellites operated by
  EUMETSAT.
- **EUMETSAT**: Europe's meteorological satellite agency, an intergovernmental
  organization.
  - **goal**: Produce satellite data on weather, climate, and the environment.
    Provide near-real time data for members, partners, and other data users.
  - **fields**: Nowcasting, Numerical Weather Prediction models, Climate records,
    Other products and services (incl.  firefighting, air quality forecasts, air
    traffic control, search and rescue missions, disaster risk reduction,
    agricultural productivity, marine and coastal management......)

###  Main data resources {.smaller}

<div style="margin-top: 1em;"></div>

::: tiny
- [EUMETSAT data store](https://data.eumetsat.int/search) / [EUMETSAT data catalogue](https://user.eumetsat.int/catalogue)
- [EUMETSAT 'data archive'](https://archive.eumetsat.int/)
- Satellite Application Facilities SAF
  - [AC SAF, Atmospheric Composition Monitoring](https://www.eumetsat.int/ac-saf), ozone, trace gases, aerosols and ultraviolet data
  - [H SAF, Operational Hydrology and Water Management](https://www.eumetsat.int/h-saf), data for operational hydrological
  - [LSA SAF, Land Surface Analysis](https://www.eumetsat.int/lsa-saf), land, land-atmosphere interactions and biosphere
  - [NWC SAF, Nowcasting and Very Short Range Forecasting](https://www.eumetsat.int/nwc-saf), forecast for the next few hours
  - [NWP SAF, Numerical Weather Prediction](https://www.eumetsat.int/nwp-saf), interface between satellite data and European activities in NWP
  - [OSI SAF, Ocean and Sea Ice](https://www.eumetsat.int/osi-saf), ocean-atmosphere interface
  - [ROM SAF, Radio Occultation Meteorology](https://www.eumetsat.int/rom-saf), high-quality GNSS Radio Occultation (RO) data for NWP and climate application areas
:::

### LI Lightning Imager (MTG-I) {.smaller}

LI Lightning Imager Groups

::: tiny
| Variable             | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `group_time`         | UTC time of the group                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| `latitude`           | Avg latitude of the events in the group weighted by the event radiance                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `longitude`          | Avg longitude of the events in the group weighted by the event radiance                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `radiance`           | Total radiance of the group ([Optical Characteristics of OTD Flashes and the Implications...](https://doi.org/10.1175/2010JTECHA1405.1)[)](https://user.eumetsat.int/resources/user-guides/mtg-li-level-2-data-guide#)                       |
| `number_of_events`   | Number of events in the group                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `flash_id`           | ID of the flash that allows one to relate the groups in the LI-2-LGR-x-FD-x to the LI-2-LFL-x-FD-x                                                                                                                                           |
| `group_filter_qa`    | Quality of the group computed at the group-rejection step ([Rejection of groups prior to the comp...](https://user.eumetsat.int/resources/user-guides/mtg-li-level-2-data-guide#ID-Rejection-of-groups-prior-to-the-computation-of-flashes)) |
:::

### LI Lightning Imager (MTG-I) {.smaller}

LI Lightning Imager Flashes

::: tiny
| Variable                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `flash_time`              | UTC time of the first group in the flash                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `flash_duration`          | Duration of the flash, ie, time difference between the first a the last group of the flash                                                                                                                                |
| `latitude`                | Average latitude of the events in the flash weighted by the event radiance                                                                                                                                                |
| `longitude`               | Average longitude of the events in the flash weighted by the event radiance                                                                                                                                               |
| `radiance`                | Total radiance of the flash ([Optical Characteristics of OTD Flashes and the Implications...](https://doi.org/10.1175/2010JTECHA1405.1))                                                                                  |
| `number_of_events`        | Number of events in the flash                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `number_of_groups`        | Number of groups in the flash                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `flash_footprint`         | Size of the flash footprint in number of pixels                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `flash_id`                | ID of the flash                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `flash_filter_confidence` | Quality of the filter computed at the group-rejection step ([Rejection of flashes](https://user.eumetsat.int/resources/user-guides/mtg-li-level-2-data-guide#ID-Rejection-of-groups-prior-to-the-computation-of-flashes)) |
:::

### InfraRed Sounder IRS (MTG-S) {.smaller}

**Hyperspectral infrared sounder**

- Goal: 
   - Derive the evolution of vertically resolved water vapour structures
   - Extract 3D wind fields with a vertical resolution ~ 2 km
   - Track the 3D structures
      - atmospheric water vapour and temperature
      - carbon monoxide and pollution
      - atmospheric dynamic variables

- Spatial:  **4km** at nadir (1.025° x 1.025°)
- Temporal: 15 -- 30  minutes for local zones, **60 minutes** for full disk


::: notes
spatial on the Earth surface is 4km at nadir, increasing up to 10km, and above

160 x 160 interferograms and four broad-band high-resolution images for each spectral band

No concurrent ‘full disc scan’

160 x 160 x (877;1076)
:::

###  Sentinel-4/Ultraviolet, Visible and Near-infrared Spectrometer (S4 / UVN) (MTG-S) {.smaller}

<div style="margin-top: 1em;"></div>

**objective**: Observe the diurnal cycle of the tropospheric composition, trace gases, aerosol and cloud properties

::: {.tiny style="text-align:center; width:80%; margin:auto;"}
O3 (Ozone), NO2 (Nitrogen dioxide), SO2 (Sulfur dioxide), HCHO
(Formaldehyde), CHOCHO (glyoxal)
:::

<div style="margin-top: 1em;"></div>

::: {.tiny}
|                                 |                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Instrument type                 | Passive imaging spectrometer                                                             |
| Spectrometric bands             | **3**, Ultraviolet (305-400 nm), Visible (400-500 nm) and Near Infrared(750-775 nm) [^1] |
| Spectrometric channels          | **2**, (UV-VIS channel; NIR channel)                                                     |
| Field Of View                   | E-W: 30°W-46.5°E @ 40°N, N-S: 30°N-65°N                                                  |
| Spatial resolution              | 8 x 8 km^2^                                                                              |
| Spectral resolution             | 0.5 nm for the UV-VIS channel; 0.12 nm for the NIR channel                               |
| Radiometric accuracy (absolute) | 3% (2% goal) of the measured sun irradiance, earth radiance and spectral reflectance.    |
| Revisit time                    | ~ 60 min                                                                                 |
:::

[^1]: VIS and NIR bands implemented in two spectrometers UVVIS & NIR)
